### Generic functional annotation results

```{r fctannsetup_{{ENTRY_ID}}}
require(magrittr)

#----- load cluster profiler results
MAPPED <- readRDS(subset(file_tab, step=="fctann" & extension=="genes.rds"  & contrast=="{{ENTRY_ID}}")$filename)

CONTRAST_CONFIG <- yaml::read_yaml(subset(file_tab, step=="fctann" & extension=="contrast.yaml"  & contrast=="{{ENTRY_ID}}")$filename)

PLOTS_DIR  <- file.path(PLOTS_BASE_DIR, "fctann")
dir.create(PLOTS_DIR, recursive=TRUE, showWarnings=FALSE, mode="0750")

fn <- subset(file_tab, step=="fctann" & extension=="ora.rds" & contrast=="{{ENTRY_ID}}")$filename
if (file.exists(fn)) ORA  <- readRDS(fn)
fn <- subset(file_tab, step=="fctann" & extension=="gsea.rds"   & contrast=="{{ENTRY_ID}}")$filename
if (file.exists(fn)) GSEA <- readRDS(fn)
```
